mapper.insert: insert into alipaylistinfo( consumerid, INSERTDATETIME, OUT_TRADE_NO, money_type, TOTAL_AMOUNT, SUBJECT, TIMEOUT_EXPRESS) values( #{consumerid}, #{insertdatetime}, #{outtradeno}, #{moneyType}, #{totalAmount}, #{subject}, #{timeoutExpress} )
mapper.update: update alipaylistinfo set notify_time=#{notifyTime}, sign=#{sign}, trade_no=#{tradeNo}, BUYER_USER_ID=#{buyerUserId}, buyer_logon_id=#{buyerLogonId}, trade_status=#{tradeStatus}, total_amount=#{totalAmount}, subject=#{subject}, gmt_payment=#{gmtPayment} where out_trade_no=#{outtradeno} and money_type=#{moneyType}
